total.Description: ADOS Generic or ADOS-2 Module 4 Total Score {0..23}

comm.Description: ADOS-G or ADOS-2 Module 4 Communication Total {0..10}

social.Description: ADOS-G or ADOS-2 Module 4 Reciprocal Social Interaction Total {0..14}

stereo_behav.Description: ADOS-G or ADOS-2 Module 4 Stereotyped Behaviors and Restricted Interest Total {0..6}

creativity.Description: ADOS-G or ADOS-2 Module 4 Imagination/Creativity Total  {0..2}

reliable.Description: Was ADOS scored and administered by research reliable personnel
